wr_subject: [Contract] International Education and Training (Invited Training) Program 2019_KMA
wr_content:
Culture Marketing Company selected to plan and operate the "International Education and Training (Invited Training) Program 2019" organized by the Korean Meteorological Association (KMA)
We will do our best to provide the best service for development of global meteorological climate talents and the enhancement of national brand through advanced meteorological technology resource diplomacy.

--------------------------------------------Program Overview----------------------------------------------------
​Background and Purpose :
The Center for Meteorological and Climate Human Resources Development is a regional training center (RTC KOREA) designated by the World Meteorological Organization (WMO).
The center aims on :
    - Fostering global meteorological climate talents by transferring advanced weather technologies to WMO member countries, especially developing countries
    - Strengthening human resources, organizational and institutional capacity of recipient countries, and international partnership
    - Reducing the social and economic meteorological disasters in Korea by improving the capability of responding to dangerous weather and enhancing the national brand through diplomacy of advanced meteorological technology resources.

[Foreign Weather Forecasting Course]
01.Period: June 24 ~ July 13, 2019 (21 days)
02. Goal: Enhance forecast analysis ability through understanding advanced forecasting technology and train forecasters in line with international demand
03. Place: Meteorological Agency, 1F Daul Building
04. Target: Around 12 employees (High-Grade, Practitioner-level) in developing countries
05. Main Program
    - Session I. Online pre-training
    - Session II. Measure and knowledge
    - Session III. Understanding and interpreting weather data
    - Session IV. Weather forecast service
    - Session V. Study visit
    - Session VI. Action Plan Building

[Improvement process of foreign weather radar operation technology]
01.Period: September 22 - October 6, 2019 (14 days)
02. Goal: Developing capabilities for early surveillance of dangerous weather by improving meteorological radar management technology of developing countries
03. Place: Meteorological Agency, 1F Daul Building
04. Target: 15 employees of working bureau of meteorological agencies in developing countries
05. Main Program
    - SessionⅠ. Measure and knowledge
    - Session II. Weather Radar Observation
    - Session III. Weather Radar Operation
    - Session IV. Purchase and installation of weather radar
    - Session V. Study visit
    - Session VI. Action Plan Building
